Monologue.Current: Преподаватель{Line}“В ночные часы все помещения закрыты,{Line} за исключение тернировочного центра.”{Next}“Вернись в свою комнату.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“It’s after-hours. All facilities except{Line} the training center are closed.”{Next}“Return to your quarters.”

Monologue.Current: “Parking Lot”
Monologue.Original: “Parking Lot”

Monologue.Current: “Dormitory”
Monologue.Original: “Dormitory”

Monologue.Current: “Cafeteria”
Monologue.Original: “Cafeteria”

Monologue.Current: “Давай!.. Ну же!.. Ещё кружок!..”
Monologue.Original: “Come on! ...Take the pain!{Line} One more!”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“This place is huge.{Line} Do you think it’s bigger{Line} than {Term Galbadia} Garden?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“This place is huge.{Line} Do you think it’s bigger{Line} than {Term Galbadia} Garden?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Who knows?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Who knows?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“What’s over here?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“What’s over here?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“The cafeteria.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“The cafeteria.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“What about over there?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“What about over there?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“The parking lot.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“The parking lot.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}...{Line} I really appreciate{Line} you showing me around.”{Next}“But can you try to make it{Line} a little more fun?{Line} You know, like a normal tour?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Rinoa}{Line}“{Char Squall}...{Line} I really appreciate{Line} you showing me around.”{Next}“But can you try to make it{Line} a little more fun?{Line} You know, like a normal tour?”

Monologue.Current: (What does she want from me?)
Monologue.Original: (What does she want from me?)

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“Student ID No. 41269,{Line} {Char Squall}?”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Student ID No. 41269,{Line} {Char Squall}?”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yes.”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Yes.”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“The Garden Master wishes to see you.{Line} Report to the {Color Blue}〖Master’s Room〗{Color White} right away.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“The Garden Master wishes to see you.{Line} Report to the {Color Blue}〖Master’s Room〗{Color White} right away.”

Monologue.Current: {Char Squall}{Line}“Where is the{Line} {Color Blue}〖Master’s Room〗{Color White}?”
Monologue.Original: {Char Squall}{Line}“Where is the{Line} {Color Blue}〖Master’s Room〗{Color White}?”

Monologue.Current: Garden Faculty{Line}“Take the {Color Blue}〖elevator to level B1〗{Color White}.{Line} You have permission.”
Monologue.Original: Garden Faculty{Line}“Take the {Color Blue}〖elevator to level B1〗{Color White}.{Line} You have permission.”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Hello everyone.{Line} This is the headmaster speaking.”{Next}“The lines have been fixed, and I’m{Line} glad to be back on the air. Hurrah!”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“Hello everyone.{Line} This is the headmaster speaking.”{Next}“The lines have been fixed, and I’m{Line} glad to be back on the air. Hurrah!”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“UM!?”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“UM!?”

Monologue.Current: Headmaster Cid{Line}“WHOAA!!!”
Monologue.Original: Headmaster Cid{Line}“WHOAA!!!”

Monologue.Current: “That was terrible.”
Monologue.Original: “That was terrible.”

Monologue.Current: “I know.”
Monologue.Original: “I know.”

Monologue.Current: “You were so loud,{Line} cryin’ like a baby.”
Monologue.Original: “You were so loud,{Line} cryin’ like a baby.”

Monologue.Current: “I did not!”
Monologue.Original: “I did not!”

Monologue.Current: “Yeah right. WAH WAH WAH!!!{Line} BOO HOO HOO!!! Does that ring a bell?”
Monologue.Original: “Yeah right. WAH WAH WAH!!!{Line} BOO HOO HOO!!! Does that ring a bell?”

Monologue.Current: “I...didn’t...cry...{Line} wah wah...didn’t mean to...”
Monologue.Original: “I...didn’t...cry...{Line} wah wah...didn’t mean to...”

Monologue.Current: “I’m kidding!{Line} Gosh! Stop crying!{Line} I’ll buy you an ice cream!”
Monologue.Original: “I’m kidding!{Line} Gosh! Stop crying!{Line} I’ll buy you an ice cream!”

Monologue.Current: “...You promise...?”
Monologue.Original: “...You promise...?”

Monologue.Current: “Have you seen the{Line} headmaster?”
Monologue.Original: “Have you seen the{Line} headmaster?”

Monologue.Current: “Nope.”
Monologue.Original: “Nope.”

Monologue.Current: “I almost had a heart attack.”
Monologue.Original: “I almost had a heart attack.”

Monologue.Current: “I was...{Line} so scared...”
Monologue.Original: “I was...{Line} so scared...”

Monologue.Current: “Oh, stop crying.”
Monologue.Original: “Oh, stop crying.”

Monologue.Current: “Hey, she’ll be ok, right?”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, she’ll be ok, right?”

Monologue.Current: “...Yeah.{Line} It’ll take a helluva lot more{Line} than that to take her down.”
Monologue.Original: “...Yeah.{Line} It’ll take a helluva lot more{Line} than that to take her down.”

Monologue.Current: “...You’re right.”
Monologue.Original: “...You’re right.”

Monologue.Current: “Hey, let’s go visit her later.”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, let’s go visit her later.”

Monologue.Current: “Ok.”
Monologue.Original: “Ok.”

Monologue.Current: “...Right?”
Monologue.Original: “...Right?”

Monologue.Current: “...Yeah.”
Monologue.Original: “...Yeah.”

Monologue.Current: “...I guess.”
Monologue.Original: “...I guess.”

Monologue.Current: “...It’s true.”
Monologue.Original: “...It’s true.”

Monologue.Current: “No way.”
Monologue.Original: “No way.”

Monologue.Current: “Really?”
Monologue.Original: “Really?”

Monologue.Current: “Heh heh.”
Monologue.Original: “Heh heh.”

Monologue.Current: “...{Line} It’s been a while since{Line} someone beat Jack.”{Next}“I’m Club, one of the{Line} four CC Knights.”{Line} Do you dare to challenge me?”{Next}“Press {Key Cards} to{Line} challenge me.”
Monologue.Original: “...{Line} It’s been a while since{Line} someone beat Jack.”{Next}“I’m Club, one of the{Line} four CC Knights.”{Line} Do you dare to challenge me?”{Next}“Press {Key Cards} to{Line} challenge me.”

Monologue.Current: Club{Line}“Draw...”{Line}Yes{Line}No
Monologue.Original: Club{Line}“Draw...”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: Club{Line}“Not bad.{Line} But beware, there are many players{Line} far better than me in the CC Group.”
Monologue.Original: Club{Line}“Not bad.{Line} But beware, there are many players{Line} far better than me in the CC Group.”
